name: leads
description: Leads app, Dockerized for production deployment

scripts.npm-install-all: npm install && cd Server && npm install && cd .. && cd Client && npm install
scripts.dev-start-all: npm run start-local-mongo && npm-run-all -p dev-start-client dev-start-server
scripts.docker-pre-process: cd Client && ng build --prod && cd .. && cd Server && node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc -p . && npm run copy-shared && cd ..
scripts.docker-kill-all: docker-compose down && docker rmi $(docker images -q) && npm run stop-local-mongo

author: Pixel Mocha
